uploadedVideos.name: intro-variables.mp4
uploadedVideos.transcription: Welcome to this lesson on JavaScript variables and data types. In this video, we'll cover the fundamental concepts of variables, how to declare them, and the different data types available in JavaScript. Let's start with understanding what variables are and why they're important in programming.

uploadedVideos.name: data-types-demo.mp4
uploadedVideos.transcription: Now let's look at the different data types in JavaScript. We have strings for text, numbers for numeric values, booleans for true or false values, objects for complex data structures, and arrays for lists of data.

aiGeneratedVideos.title: JavaScript Variables Explained
aiGeneratedVideos.prompt: Create an educational video explaining JavaScript variables with examples
